title: Healthy seafood chowder
ingredients: ['100g smoked haddock', '100g unsmoked haddock', '500ml skimmed milk', '500ml vegetable stock', '2 sprigs thyme', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 leek, sliced', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 large sweet potato, peeled and diced', '50g red lentils', '200g sweetcorn, tinned or frozen']
